sentences.english: Assistant General Manager of a five-star hotel in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 深圳某五星級酒店總經理助理。

sentences.english: What kind of hotel would you like, five-star or something simpler?
sentences.chinese: 您願意要什麼樣的酒店，五星級的還是普通些的？

sentences.english: I'll shoot the works this time by giving you a treat in a five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這次我也豁出去了，到五星級大飯店請你們喫一頓。

sentences.english: And we spent the night at a five-star hotel in Jiangmen city.
sentences.chinese: 我們在江門市一家五星級酒店過了夜。

sentences.english: We have good service in our park and a four star-rated hotel is being set up.
sentences.chinese: 園區接待環境良好，正在興建1座四星級酒店。

sentences.english: All five-star hotels offer conference facilities.
sentences.chinese: 五星級酒店都提供會議設施。

sentences.english: And some three star hotel is actively practice the internal organs, to meet competition.
sentences.chinese: 而一些三星級酒店則積極練好內功，迎接競爭。

sentences.english: A 6-star resort villa if you are going to the Maldives!
sentences.chinese: 這是你去馬爾代夫島的6星級度假公寓。

sentences.english: Public toilets will be rated from one to five stars.
sentences.chinese: 公廁評定將從一星級一直到五星級。

sentences.english: Public toilets will be rated from one to five stars.
sentences.chinese: 公廁評定將從一星級一直到五星級。

sentences.english: At least 1 year working experience in 4-star hotel;
sentences.chinese: 一年以上四星級酒店管家部樓層房務員工作經驗。

sentences.english: A man and a woman are tenderly making love in a one star hotel room.
sentences.chinese: 一對情人正在一家一星級酒店裏共沐愛河。

sentences.english: Available are high-class hotels in hygienic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 有星級賓館，衛生條件不錯。

sentences.english: Dalian Friendship Hotel is an earliest star-rated hotel engaged in foreign-related operation in Dalian.
sentences.chinese: 大連友誼賓館是大連最早從事涉外經營的星級賓館。

sentences.english: The only two missing star positions are for Betelgeuse and Rigel.
sentences.chinese: 只有兩個失蹤星級職務是參宿四和參宿七。

definition: to offer (goods or services)/to open (for business etc)
to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
to taste a small amount/to sample
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
to create/original creation/to be the first to do sth
